for _ in range(int(raw_input())):
    raw_input()
    pies = sorted(map(int, raw_input().split()))
    racks = sorted(map(int, raw_input().split()))
    ans = 0
    for pie in pies:
        for rack in racks:
            if pie <= rack:
                racks.remove(rack)
                ans +=1
                break
    print ans
